comments:
build 2002-01-29 on Win98.

I connected to dev.eclipse.org and loaded ant, boot, runtime, and resources 
into my workspace no problem.

I tried to load pde.core and got the following in my log file. The major 
difference is that it is a PDE project where the others are not.

Is there a problem in the PDE plugin activation?

Here is the log info:

Note: this is reproducable every time.

Note: I started up a new workspace and (without any projects) was able to open 
the PDE perspective.

This is a new bug. I am trying create the progress monitor dialog 
because 'setEcipseHome' may require a build, but I am obviously passing
the wrong Display (from another thread). Will fix.
*** Bug 9273 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Found in JDT UI Inbox, but seems to belong to PDE.

PDE has been cut into PDE Core and PDE UI long time ago to avoid these kinds of 
things to happen. We haven't seen this for ages. Closing.
